name: VMware, Inc. / VMware Intl, Ltd.
goal: VMware is the industry-leading virtualization software company.  Its technologies simplify Information Technology (IT) complexity and streamline operations, helping businesses become more agile, efficient and profitable. By virtualizing infrastructure—from the data center to the cloud to mobile devices—we enable IT to deliver services from any device, anytime, anywhere.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
• Information Technology
• Data Center Virtualization
• Acquisition Reform
• Cybersecurity Policy
• Digital Single Market Policy
• Privacy and Data Management
• Cloud Policy
• 5G Policy
• Artificial Intelligence Policy
• Energy Efficiency
